message: MySQL vs PostgreSQL which is better? any Idea?

data.message:
i think the comparison between any thing in the tech industry is totally wrong , you just want to take what suits and do the job perfectly.
you may have to compare between the options and what every single candidate give you and whose the best for the job.
maybe you  want to start with the job analyses man ..

#هري_لا_يساعد_مطلقاً
#فذلكة

PostgresSQL is better.
Rob Conery has an excellent tutorial on why PostgreSQL is better than MySQL (not free)
http://tekpub.com/collections/databases/products/pg
He gives a good summary of it in this video (free, 1 hour)
http://vimeo.com/43536445
